mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rehugi (hnum, unum, rhcontent, rhwriteday) VALUES (#{hnum}, #{unum}, #{rhcontent}, now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM rehugi WHERE rhnum = #{rhnum} OR ref = #{rhnum}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.unickname AS user_unickname FROM rehugi c JOIN user u ON c.unum = u.unum WHERE c.hnum = #{hnum} ORDER BY c.rhwriteday ASC;
SELECT * FROM rehugi WHERE hnum = #{hnum} ORDER BY ref ASC, step ASC
